To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private InNeck _inneck;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_inneck = InNeck(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_inneck.IsReady)
{
    var period = _inneck.Period.Value;
    var current = _inneck.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.inneck = self.InNeck(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.inneck.IsReady:
    period = self.inneck.Period.Value
    current = self.inneck.Current.Value
